DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose/s of this study is to examine the effects of 4 weeks of dietary nitrate supplementation on peripheral chemoreceptor sensitivity, spontaneous baroreflex sensitivity, and blood pressure responsiveness to a variety of physiological stressors in older healthy adults. We will also examine the effect of dietary nitrate supplementation on measures of central artery stiffness and aortic blood pressure in older adults.
DOC.criteria: Healthy older adults 6085 years of age Hypertension, hyperlipidemia, current smoker or smoker within the last year, heart disease, diabetes, Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, asthma, sleep apnea, Raynaud's disease, body mass index (BMI) > 30 kg/m2, allergy medication, clinical depression, autonomic disorders and other conditions or medications that might normally alter cardiovascular function, exercise tolerance, and/or blood pressure responses.
